description: I’m an IT Technician with a passion for backend development and Python. I graduated in Argentina in 2019 and have been living in Italy since, recently studying and practicing programming.
python_text_before: I have been studying and practicing Python with real projects and
cpp_text: My first programming language, discovered at 13 at school— sparked my passion for coding.
javascript_text: Completed an Udemy course in 2024. Comfortable with the basics of frontend scripting.
html_text: Consistent use from school to present, building responsive and styled websites.
flask_text: Developing web apps with Flask, integrating security, databases, and templates.
bootstrap_text: Styling and structuring responsive layouts with Bootstrap components.
sql_text: Experience with SQLite and ORM via SQLAlchemy for backend development.
first_project: Web Site for my Girlfriend's Massage Studio.
second_project: To-Do Website with Login and DB.
